desc: This book is for Lotus Notes power users, administrators, and developers working with any version of Lotus Notes/Domino, who want to upgrade to Lotus Notes/Domino 8.5.3. Additionally, it can be leveraged by management to gain a high-level understanding of the new features and capabilities offered within the products.

details.authors: Barry Rosen, Tim Speed, Scott O'Keefe

title: IBM Lotus Notes and Domino 8.5.3: Upgraderâ€™s Guide
